name: EARTH (Molten Labs)
description:
EARTH
Earth is an first-person exploration game where our objective is to plant trees around the Earth ( is flat ) to help overcome potential climate change threats and save our planet.

=> Controls :
=> Movement with WASD and mouse.
=> Left mouse click to interact.
=> Shift (HOLD) to sprint.
=>Space to jump.
=>Hold Escape to go to Main Menu.
=>ALT + F4 to Quit the game : D
=> Cheat Code : '\' ( Quick Checkpoint Spawn );


=>Theme Interpretation :
The idea to make this game came from some recent unfortunate events  ( Climate change, Global Warming, Pollution ) taking place around the globe and this game was made to create some awareness about it. We all know about this and we ignore it, but the truth can be denied not avoided. So lets fight this together and have fun playing "Earth".


Credits for the soundtrack : Interception - Kai Engel


CAN YOU BEAT THE SURVIVOR MODE?
